multi_tenant_architecture.description: Complete multi-tenant architecture with organization isolation, resource management, and usage tracking

enterprise_security.description: Advanced RBAC, MFA, password policies, audit logging, and threat monitoring

audit_trail_system.description: Comprehensive audit logging with compliance framework support (SOX, GDPR, HIPAA, ISO27001, SOC2)

sso_integration.description: Enterprise SSO with Azure AD, OKTA, Google Workspace, SAML2, LDAP, and Active Directory

api_governance.description: Enterprise API management with rate limiting, authentication, caching, and usage analytics

enterprise_reporting.description: Comprehensive reporting integrated across all enterprise services

scalability_optimizations.description: Performance optimizations, caching, and scalability features implemented across all services

compliance_monitoring.description: Real-time compliance monitoring and automated reporting for multiple frameworks
